title: Getting Started Step 1: Set Your Goals

content.html: The most important thing about financial planning is to start. The end - financial peace, paying all your bills by default, comes later. So let's get started.
Why take control of your finances?

You didn't decide to plan your finances because you love math. Well, there's that (Blitzbudget takes care of that mostly), but financial planning starts with mapping your goals. They could be as simple as, preparing for paying your bills or it could be profound, like a plan to buy a home you were dreaming of! Her's how
• assignmentGetting Started: What's next
